name: Michael Jackson
birth_place: 加拿大,安大略省,渥太华

last_movies.title: The Trailer Park Boys Christmas Special
拖车公园男孩 第一季

introduction: Michael Jackson (born November 8, 1970) is a Canadian actor, grip and gaffer known for his acting role as "Trevor" in the comedy TV series Trailer Park Boys (2001–2006) and the later film Trailer Park Boys: The Movie (2006).[1]Jackson was born in Ottawa, Ontario and grew up[1] in Dartmouth, Nova Scotia, where he currently lives.He has contributed to the local music scene[citation needed] with many group and solo projects, including Moral Support, Aimless, Thruster, The Thursday Toads, Pink Kitten, Defense Andrew, The Sycamores, Rick of The Skins, El Groupo De Rock, Vavoom, T-Bag, The Olympian and most recently Doug Mason. He is also an IATSE 849 member and has been working as a grip since 1998.
